name: MEC Orion USB Rear Light
description: Dusk, dawn, and everything in between – no matter when you ride, the Orion’s super-bright LED light array will help keep you seen.6 modes: high (2 hours at 30 lumens), medium (4 hours at 15 lumens), low (8 hours at 7 lumens), quick flash (20 hours at 7 lumens), signal flash (3.5 hours) and warning flash (3 hours).220° viewing angle helps keep you seen from the sides.Mode memory starts your light in the last mode used.Easy USB charging means you no longer have to get by with “good enough” batteries.Internal buzzer lets you know when it is time to charge your light; 10 second buzz when the battery is below 10% and 3 short bursts when the battery is drained.Light and efficient lithium-polymer batteries.Tool-free strap mount is aero seat post–compatible and easy to connect to your bike.Integrated belt clip for quick attachment to packs, bags or pocket edges.
